alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 9:05AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Cold front passage will create areas of heavy snow, strong winds, and lowered visibility... A cold front is expected to move through northern Nevada this afternoon. Along the front, a quick burst of heavy snow is possible in spots along with strong winds and visibilities down below one mile. This could create hazardous driving conditions and slick roads. These hazardous conditions should last up to thirty minutes until the front passes. Please use caution when traveling this afternoon and pull over if safe to do so until conditions improve. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
